about.description: Some additionals information about the bot and its related topics
about.name: about

topic.description: The topic thatâ€™s of interest to you
topic.name: topic

text.bot:
Hello,
I'm Sparky, a french Discord bot for Lords Mobile players. I was created by Kyusaor in 2020, to help guild's servers as best as I can in their Lord lives. A server exists to help and group players (/**contact** command), if you have any questions about me don't hesitate to join and inquire!

About a technical part, I'm coded in Typescript using the discord.js library, with a SQL database
text.dev:
Hi,
I'm Kyusaor and Iâ€™ve been a Lords Mobile player, and part of the French guild imp, since 2016. Iâ€™ve also been a Discord bot developer and a moderator, then main admin, of the French Lords Mobile Discord since 2019. I originally made the server's bot to add a bunch of useful functions (to the gameâ€¦ to the serverâ€¦ whatever the noun should be here lol) and due to several member demands to be able to use these functions in their own servers, I developed Sparky. Please don't hesitate to contact me if you need anything! ðŸ˜‰
text.permissions:
Here are the permissions I need to work, and the reason why I need them:
> __The essentials:__
> -Send messages: I guess this one is kinda obvious isn't it? :blobowo: 
> -Embed links: most of my messages are in embeds, the bots' rectangular message format
> -Attach files: to be able to send images for serveral commands (**/lineup** for instance)
> 
> __The optionnals:__
> -Manage roles: to be able to create/delete the **/watcher** command's roles (hell events mentions)
> -Manage channels: same, but for the channels
> -Use external emojis: Some of the emotes I use are from my server, so they wouldn't appear if I don't have this permission (a weird <:anemote:123456789> would appear instead, not dramatic but could be annoying)

Note: gems cost decreasing when troop amount increase, it's not showed there*

text.embedDescription: The list of people who offered their support during the bot's development
thanks: Who accepted to be my laboratory rats for an almost-ready bot
Who helped me to support the bot hosting cost (don't hesitate to **/donate** by the way :eyes:)
Who helped me to correct my questionable english skills
To all the bot users who gave me their trust with this project :heart:

text.bonusDescription: When your guild reaches expert gauntlet, guild members access a bonus quest in addition to regular quests: three bonus quests will be given to each mate, and they will have to complete one of them to earn 175 bonus points. Members who have done this will appear in green in the guild leaderboard.
text.embedDescription: *Difficulty ranking is purely informative and is not absolute, it could obviously change from a player to another depending of their playing style*

text.commandInDM:
:flag_us: Commands don't work in private messages, you must do it on a server.
You can add me to your server thanks to the **/link** command, wich is the only one working in private !

text.migration:
## __Migration cost (scrolls)__:
*Migration cost only depends on your might position in the target kingdom's leaderboard*
*Migration scrolls can be bought with guilds coins (810k), or by buying the "Up and away" pack*
*To check a kingdom's migration cost, you can open the target kingdom's map, click on a position, then "migrate". The cost will be displayed on the confirm button*

**1st place:** 90
**2nd place**: 65
**3rd place**: 50
**4th place**: 35
**5th place**: 30
**6th place**: 28
**7th place**: 26
**8th place**: 24
**9th place**: 22
**10th place**: 20

**46-50th place**: 2
**51st place and less**: 1

text.askIfDelete:
Do you want to delete the  <#{text}> and <#{text2}> channels?

:warning: **This action is irreversible!**
text.boardAlreadyCreated: The notification board has already been created, you can refresh the missing roles and channels with the **/watcher refresh** command
text.boardEmbedDescription: Select hell events and challenges you're interested in. Mentions will be done in the <#{id}> channel
text.boardEmbedFieldValue: Click on the scrolling menu below and select the events you want to get notified for. That's it!
text.boardMenuOptionDescription: Get notified when a {text} event starts
text.boardTopic: Subscribe to hell events and challenges notifications!
text.createSuccess:
Done! <#{text}> and <#{text2}> channels were successfully created
You're free to rename them or move them in the channels list as long as you delete nothing :wink:
Type `/{text3}` to delete them and the roles
*Note that reports are made by the bot staff, some events could be missed*
text.deleteSuccess:
Hell mention channels were deleted !
To define them again, use `/{text}`

tipsFooter.text: Type the /help command to get some help!
Use the /language command to change the bot's language!
Use /watcher to get notifications on hell events
Fun fact: I'm the best bot in the world

global.welcomeMsg:
Let me introduce myself: I am Sparky, a Lords Mobile Discord bot, made for guild servers.

My commands list can be found by typing **/help** on your server. Thanks for adding me !

helpMention.description: To get my command list, use **/help**
helpMention.title: Lost?

blackwing.activableAbilityDescription: Kills every enemy wounded troops (including garnison and allied troops) in your first attack within the next 30 minutes
blackwing.name: Blackwing
blackwing.warTalentDesctiption: Deals 600% damages based on your inital infantry ATT to one of the largest enemy squads when 4% of your troops have fallen
